name: Staunch Defense Lite
description:
Staunch Defense is a tower defense game with plenty of depth and strategy. Featuring 20 (6 in the lite version) different towers , 6 (3 in the lite version) buildings such as cottages and walls and a large number of technologies there are many ways you can approach each map. Each of the 24 (8 in the lite version) maps has its own selection from the large variety of different enemies and thus requires its own strategy.


Features:
- 6 different towers (full version has 20)

- 3 different buildings (full version has 6)

- 8 different maps (these maps are unique to the lite versions)
